title: 22 perches prime property & two storey house with garden, Nugegoda
details:
22 perches of prime property, with well-designed two-storey house, separate detached office space (ideal for Air BnB let or as home office) and landscaped front garden available for sale in a great central location on the main Old Kottawa road, 500 meters from Embuldeniya junction. The spacious house consists of 5 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms (one ensuite) and several lounge/living areas both upstairs and downstairs. The garage has space for one large vehicle and paved driveway from main gate (has space to accommodate two more vehicles). There’s a lovely outdoor seating area attached to the main house with a pergola. The detached office space has its own private entrance and mini garden. Supermarkets and other amenities within walking distance. Nugegoda town centre, Maharagama, and the southern expressway just a 10-15 minute drive away.

Clear deeds. Ideal for residential or commercial use. Expected price 75 million. Inspection by appointment only. Please email dili1484@gmail.com or call 0718084541 or 0715141949
